title: How Jonny Harris went from a one-man show to a household name | CBC Television
text:
Jonny Harris started his career unsure if he'd even get to have one. Given how few opportunities were available for actors in his native Newfoundland, he figured he'd eventually end up "penniless in a ditch somewhere." Thanks to a ton of hard work and some lucky breaks with 22 Minutes star Mary Walsh and a character re-write for Murdoch Mysteries, Harris is now a Canadian household name.

Watch Jonny talk about his unexpected path to stardom, and why working on Still Standing means so much to him.
description: How does a guy from Pouch Cove, N.L. wind up becoming a TV star?
